alert.note: Alert for Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:25PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Valley County through 830 PM MDT... At 724 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 21 miles west of Opheim to near Tampico. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opheim, Tampico, St. Marie, Vandalia, Thoeny and Baylor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
